name: Rally Shift Extreme - Racing Game Inspired by Rally Racing
blurb: Experience the thrill of driving the most advanced rally cars in the world on the toughest roads in all weather conditions.

rewards.reward: No Reward
A Great Thank You! And our eternal gratitude for supporting the Rally Shift Extreme project.
Thank You Email. We send you a personal Thank You! email including a hires wallpaper for supporting the Rally Shift Extreme project.

First In Line Game Download\r\n=============================\r\nGet a head-start at the race. You get a downloadable DRM free copy of the game so you can start racing right away the day it is released plus 3 high resolution digital wallpapers.

Game Download\r\n=============================\r\nGet a head-start at the race. You get a downloadable DRM free copy of the game so you can start racing right away the day it is released plus 3 high resolution digital wallpapers.

Soundtrack Download
=============================
You get the downloadable Game Soundtrack including an extra bonus track. Now you can enjoy the music from RSX even when you are not playing the game.
=============================
This also includes: Game Download

Postcard
=============================
To show you our appreciation we will mail you a cool Rally Shift Extreme postcard. You can even think of it as a mini poster :)
=============================
This also includes: Game Download + Soundtrack Download

Private Forum
============================= 
You will have access to the private backers forum where you will receive insider development information and updates. You can discuss the game, ask questions, share ideas and more.
=============================
This also includes: Game Download + Soundtrack Download + Postcard

Beta Access.
=============================
You will have access to beta builds of the game as they become available. This is an excellent opportunity to take the game for an early test drive, offer feedback and help us polish it to perfection.
=============================
This also includes: Game Download + Soundtrack Download + Postcard + Private Forum

Limited Edition DVD
=============================
You will receive a physical manufactured Limited Edition Game DVD. These will only be made for the backer rewards as a one-time production run. A true Limited Edition.
=============================
This also includes: Game Download + Soundtrack Download + Postcard + Private Forum + Beta Access

Game Credits
=============================
You launch the game, go to the credits screen and there it is. Your name in the game credits! At this pledge tier you will have your name listed in the general Game Credits in the game. Be listed as one of them who made the game possible!
=============================
This also includes: Game Download + Soundtrack Download + Postcard + Private Forum + Beta Access + Limited Edition DVD

2X Limited Edition DVDs
=============================
One is good. Two is double the good. You will receive two Limited Edition Game DVDs! You can keep one DVD for yourself and  give one DVD as a great gift to a friend. You will also have your name listed in the general Game Credits.
=============================
This also includes: Game Download + Soundtrack Download + Postcard + Private Forum + Beta Access

RSX T-Shirt
=============================
You have the game, the DVD, the credits, the postcard plus a bunch of other stuff. But where’s the t-shirt? It is right here. Now you will also receive a cool Rally Shift Extreme T-shirt to add to the loot.
=============================
This also includes: Game Download + Soundtrack Download + Postcard + Private Forum + Beta Access + Limited Edition DVD + Game Credits

RSX Poster Only
=============================
This one includes only the RSX Poster and postcard of the physical rewards. It does not include the DVD or T-shirt. Your name will be in the general Game Credits and you will get all the other digital rewards listed below.
=============================
This also includes: Game Download + Soundtrack Download + Postcard + Private Forum + Beta Access

RSX Poster
=============================
Adorn your wall with the Rally Shift Extreme Poster. You will receive the cool 18” x 24” RSX Poster printed on high quality paper plus all the other goodies. If you like to get a lot of stuff, this is it.
=============================
This also includes: Game Download + Soundtrack Download + Postcard + Private Forum + Beta Access + Limited Edition DVD + Game Credits + RSX T-Shirt

Special VIP Game Credits
=============================
The VIP treatment for playing an instrumental role in making this game possible. As a very generous backer, your name will appear in the Special VIP Game Credits section in the game.
=============================
This also includes: Game Download + Soundtrack Download + Postcard + Private Forum + Beta Access + Limited Edition DVD + RSX T-Shirt + RSX Poster

NPC Driver Named
=============================
You will be able to name an NPC driver in the game. It can be your own name or a fictional name of your choice, within good taste.
=============================
This also includes: Game Download + Soundtrack Download + Postcard + Private Forum + Beta Access + Limited Edition DVD + RSX T-Shirt + RSX Poster + Special VIP Game Credits

Rally Sponsor
=============================
Your name or logo will be displayed on a billboard somewhere along one of the rally courses, within good taste.
=============================
This also includes: Game Download + Soundtrack Download + Postcard + Private Forum + Beta Access + Limited Edition DVD + RSX T-Shirt + RSX Poster + Special VIP Game Credits

Major Rally Sponsor
=============================
As a major sponsor of the game you can have your name or logo prominently displayed along the rally courses, within good taste.
=============================
This also includes: Game Download + Soundtrack Download + Postcard + Private Forum + Beta Access + Limited Edition DVD + RSX T-Shirt + RSX Poster + Special VIP Game Credits

Rally Team
=============================
Your name or logo will be prominently displayed on one of the rally cars, within good taste.
=============================
This also includes: Game Download + Soundtrack Download + Postcard + Private Forum + Beta Access + Limited Edition DVD + RSX T-Shirt + RSX Poster + Special VIP Game Credits

Rally Designer
=============================
You get to pick a car! A car of your choice will be created and included in the game. The chosen car must fit in with the theme and idea of the game.
=============================
This also includes: Game Download + Soundtrack Download + Postcard + Private Forum + Beta Access + Limited Edition DVD + RSX T-Shirt + RSX Poster + Special VIP Game Credits
